title: GEODE-4863: refactor jdbc commands to use this public api
body:
* refactored jdbc connector commands to use public cc service
   * removed JdbcConnectorServiceXmlGenerator
   * removed RegionMappingBuilder & ConnectionConfigBuilder
   * if cc service is running then user can only alter whats available in CC
   * describe & List commands now list entries from cc service
   * converted some integration tests to junits
   * removed unwanted functions, tests

body:

- Added unit test for `GetClusterConfigurationFunction`.
- Added integration tests for `ClusterConfigurationLoader`.
- Set 'InternalLocator.isSharedConfigurationEnabled()' visibility
  as `public`.
- Set `ClusterConfigurationLoader.requestConfigurationFromOneLocator()`
  visibility as `protected`.
- `GetClusterConfigurationFunction` now throws an exception if the
  cluster configuraiton service is not enabled on the locator.
- `GetClusterConfigurationFunction` now returns null if the cluster
  configuraiton service is enabled but not yet started. The caller can
  decide whether to retry or fail fast.

title: GEODE-4961: Allowing custom serialization formats with the protobuf protocol
body:
Allowing the user to customize the serialization of values with the protobuf protocol.

I split this PR into several commits, hopefully this will make it easier to review:
 - Renamed AuthenticationRequest to HandshakeRequest - this is because we will be sending multiple fields as part of the handshake, not all of them authentication related.
 - Cleaned up the protobuf connection states to allow for handshakes without authorization
 - Added a ValueSerializer interface on the server
 - Allowing the experimental driver to use the ValueSerializer.

title: GEODE-4840: do not deserialize PdxInstances for remote gets
body:
The preferCD flag is now passed down to convertPdxInstanceIfNeeded.

If preferCD is true then the caller wants the serialized form back
from the load and in that case the PdxInstances bytes are wrapped
in a PreferBytesCachedDeserializable and it is returned.

So now the PdxInstance will only be deserialized if a local get is
done and pdx-read-serialized is false.

title: GEODE-4872: handle Blob when reading from JDBC
body:
When a pdx BYTE_ARRAY or OBJECT field is read and
the column type is BLOB, getBlob is called and
its value is converted to a byte[].
    
Also added better coverage to the SqlToPdxInstanceCreator unit test.
